body.name: VTech Sing It Out Karaoke Bluetooth Microphone , White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 17 mins
features: Choose from 15 preloaded children's songs like "Itsy Bitsy Spider" and "Old MacDonald" to sing along to; drop out the lyrics with the press of a button to sing karaoke style to favorite tunes
Sing with color-changing lights flashing from the microphone; hear encouragement and applause after you perform
Expand the fun with BLUETOOTH wireless technology to connect to your own music; music player not included
Try out five silly voice effects like reverb, echo or robot sounds
Intended for ages 2–5 years; requires 3 AAA batteries; batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use
body.description: Take the stage and sing with the Sing It Out Karaoke Microphone™! Let your vocals shine with this kid-size microphone. Sing along to the 15 included songs, then press a button to drop out the vocals when you’re ready to sing alone. Children's favorites like "Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star" and "One, Two, Buckle My Shoe" make it easy for everyone to sing along to familiar songs. Party lights on the mic add pizzazz to your performance as they change color and flash along to the music. Use BLUETOOTH® wireless technology to play your own music. Ready to mix it up? Hit the voice-changer button and try out five silly voice effects like reverb, echo or robot sounds to impress your audience. Hear the cheers as the microphone adds sounds and encouraging phrases. You are the star of the show! Intended for ages 2–5 years. Requires 3 AAA batteries. Batteries included for demo purposes only. New batteries recommended for regular use. Music player not included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Developmental Benefits: Auditory stimulation Imaginative play Musical creativity La-la-love to sing! Take the stage with the Sing It Out Karaoke Microphone. Connect to little one's music or sing along to the included songs, with the vocals or karaoke style. Children's favorites like "Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star" and "One, Two, Buckle My Shoe" make it easy for everyone to sing along! Parent-friendly features include volume control for quieter play, durable design and an automatic shut-off.

Features Karaoke for Kids Sing along to 15 included songs, then press a button to drop out the vocals and take the lead. Bluetooth Compatible Use Bluetooth wireless technology to connect to a personal device and sing along to favorite songs (music player not included). Mix It Up The voice changer lets little singers try out five silly voice effects like reverb, echo or robot sounds. Pretend Performance Get the party started with color changing lights on the mic that flash to the music. Add cheers and applause for more fun.

VTech Sing It Out Karaoke Microphone VTech Zoo Jamz Tiger Rock Guitar VTech KidiBeats Drum Set LeapFrog On-the-Go Story Pal VTech KidiStar DJ Mixer Item Model Number 80-551060 80-537800 80-134400 80-613700 80-547300 Age Range 2-5 Years 1.5-4 Years 2-5 Years 3-8 Years 5-10 Years Product Description Encourage your little singer with colorful lights and 15 built-in songs or connect to an external music source. Rock and roar all day with this friendly tiger guitar. Create your own music or play along to rock, blues and country melodies. Learn more than music with VTech's KidiBeats Drum Set. This musical instrument educational toy teaches toddlers letters and numbers in fun interactive ways. Cute, bunny-shaped audio player includes stories, poems, songs and lullabies that kids can take anywhere for screen-free entertainment. Create your own DJ sound mixes using the included songs or your own music. Remix 2000+ sound combinations!

reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift. It was cute. the recipient liked it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fun gift for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: super fun gift for a toddler! simple to use, has the ability to connect to bluetooth to play any songs and sing along. i believe it runs on 2 AA batteries. A must gift for a toddler!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 5 month UPDATE:This thing is STURDY! It has stood up to the beating my toddler gives it. It's literally tossed about on hard floors daily. My toddler plays with it everyday, except for when we hide it when we're out of batteries.Which brings me to a major CON: THIS THING EATS BATTERIES. I'd say on average it gets about 20 mins of use each day and dies after about 2 weeks. We really love it though. You've been warned.ORIGINAL REVIEW:ConsHeavier then expected. Although it's nice sturdy plastic, I get a little on edge when my daughter drops it on onto the tiled floor. Wish it came with a rubberised glove or something. For now, play time with it will remain heavily supervised as she's only 12 months old.Speaker gets crackly/buzzy and distorted when you get too loud or too close to the mic. This is the biggest con for me because while the speaker gets sufficiently loud (imo) for a small toy, I just wish it handled louder sounds better. Paid $9 and would gladly pay three times that for a better quality speaker. That said, it's still a great toy and I don't regret the purchase.ProsFeels to be made of sturdy materials.Volume control15 nursery rhymes songs along with the option to play instrumentals only so you can sing along, karaoke style.5 voice filtersApplause buttonBluetooth!! Okay, so this was not a selling point for me but when I tried it, it really peaked my 12 month old's interest. How it works, is, you hold down the Bluetooth button and it beeps and tells you a code, then you search for the mic with your device's Bluetooth and, presto, you can play anything you want on the toy's speaker. Pro tip: play Ms Rachel's songs and keep your kid entertained for a significant duration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing would survive a nuclear war
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy as all hell. My daughter throws this thing around like it owes her money and it still works perfectly and hasn’t damaged my floors yet. It has however traumatized the dog who thinks she’s in the blast zone of Hiroshima every time my devil spawn launches this bad boy at the wall. However, gives me a laugh so I’d give an extra star if I could just for that. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As soon as my grand daughter took the microphone out of the Christmas wrapping, she starting trying it out. Perfect present for her and her new tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 2y old LOVES it!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, fun and great selection of songs!

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems to be working very well!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my grandchildren who are 4 and 2 years old. They love them. The volume control is a must for sure. Would highly recommend. However, I am keeping tabs on these to be certain that they remain in good working order as time goes by, and according to my son, they are durable and still going strong. Will update if this changes.
Excelente regalo y apoyo para la terapia de lenguaje de mi pequeño con autismo
This item works well, good quality and fun for one year old all the way to my 4 and 6 year olds as well

These little microphones are so easy for our kids to play with and sing with. Simple, easy, fun, bright, and they are surprisingly loud when the kids really go for it. There are features so the kids can sing along or just sing their little hearts out. Great bang for buck
